newsitem.title: USA: First Northern extends stock buyback plan.
newsitem.headline: First Northern extends stock buyback plan.

text.p: First Northern Capital Corp said Monday it will extend its stock repurchase program, originally scheduled to expire April 17, until Ocober 17.
The bank holding company said the Wisconsin Department of Financial Institutions approved the six-month extension, which will involve 219,057 common shares.
First Northern is the parent of First Northern Savings Bank, which operates 20 branch offices in northeastern Wisconsin and has assets of $617.9 million.
